channel.title: Daily Tech News Show
channel.itunes:author: Tom Merritt
channel.itunes:summary: Daily Tech News Show features host Tom Merrit and various guests discussing featured news stories from the world of tech.
channel.description: Daily Tech News Show features host Tom Merrit and various guests discussing featured news stories from the world of tech.

item.title: DTNS 2149 – Encrypt all the things
item.itunes:summary: Scott Johnson and Darren Kitchen join me to chat about the latest NSA revealtions, the ultra-secure new Blackphone, and whether encryption and security have gone mainstream. MP3 Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org. Please SUBSCRIBE HERE. Big thanks to Dan Lueders for the music and Martin Bell for the opening theme! Big thanks to Mustafa […]

item.title: DTNS 2148 – Is Net Neutrality Dead?
item.itunes:summary: Allison Sheridan and Jon Brodkin join the show to talk about the doom of Net Neutrality, uncarriers, and more. MP3 Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org. Please SUBSCRIBE HERE. Big thanks to Dan Lueders for the music and Martin Bell for the opening theme! Big thanks to Mustafa A. from thepolarcat.com for the logo! […]

item.title: DTNS 2147 – Google Buys a Nest
item.itunes:summary: Iyaz Akhtar joins to chat about products at CES you CAN actually buy, the rise of messaging apps and Google buying Nest Labs. item.title: DTNS 2146 – Curved is better than flat
item.itunes:summary: Tom chats with Nicole Lee from Engadget about the Best of CES and the new Google + email ‘feature.’ Plus Len Peralta joins to draw the stories! item.title: DTNS 2144 – Putting the smart in TV

item.title: DTNS 2143 – AT&T Slow Cooks Neutrality
item.itunes:summary: Tom chats with Jon Brodkin from Ars Technica. They’ll talk a little about CES and a lot about whether AT&T’s new ‘subsidized data’ plans break net neutrality. MP3 Multiple versions (ogg, video etc.) from Archive.org. Please SUBSCRIBE HERE. Big thanks to Dan Lueders for the music and Martin Bell for the opening theme! Big thanks to […]
